cserve.subhead: [TRANSLATION NEEDED] Customer-centric, providing one-stop talent services

automotive.name: Automobile
automotive.title: Build a talent echelon for a new energy vehicle enterprise
automotive.description: Ribo focuses on the development needs of the new energy vehicle industry, and provides targeted recruitment services for a leading new energy vehicle enterprise in the core fields such as battery R&D, intelligent driving, and vehicle design. Relying on years of industry recruitment experience and high-quality talent reserves, we efficiently build the enterprise's R&D talent echelon through precise job profile matching, multi-dimensional talent assessment, and full-process recruitment services. We help enterprises quickly supplement innovative technical forces, accelerate the R&D process of core technologies for new energy vehicles, and seize the opportunity of industry technology upgrading and market expansion, empowering the efficient implementation of enterprise strategic goals through professional talent supply.

internet.name: Internet
internet.title: Deliver core technical personnel to a leading internet enterprise
internet.description: As a human resources solutions provider specializing in the tech sector, Ribo has in-depth insights into the technological iteration and business expansion needs of the internet industry, and has customized the recruitment of talents for core positions such as software development, data algorithms, product operations, and network security for a leading internet enterprise. By virtue of the precise deconstruction of internet job competency models, the reserve of a massive technical talent pool, and an agile recruitment response mechanism, we efficiently build the enterprise's digital talent matrix through technical capability mapping matching, scenario-based interview evaluation, and full-cycle talent services.

finance.name: Finance
finance.title: Help a foreign-funded bank quickly respond to industry changes
finance.description: As Ribo accurately grasps the needs of regulatory upgrading and business innovation in the financial industry, we have targeted headhunted elites for core positions such as risk management, investment banking, compliance audit, and financial technology (FinTech) for a renowned financial institution. This cooperation focuses on helping clients quickly respond to industry changes such as the Asset Management New Regulations and the integration of financial technology. By introducing compound talents, we optimize the organizational capability structure, accelerate the implementation of innovative businesses such as wealth management and cross-border capital operations, and assist enterprises in consolidating risk prevention and control barriers and improving asset allocation efficiency through professional talent configuration, so as to strengthen core competitiveness in the context of stricter regulation and market competition.

communication.name: Communications
communication.title: Establish a strategic talent cooperation with a leading state-owned telecommunications company
communication.description: Our company has deeply aligned with the national "New Infrastructure" strategy and the digital transformation needs of the telecommunications industry, establishing a strategic talent cooperation with a leading state-owned telecommunications company to target the recruitment of key talents in core fields such as 5G/6G technology R&D. This collaboration is dedicated to assisting clients in accelerating the 5G/6G network deployment process, strengthening the security barrier of information infrastructure, and promoting the implementation of smart city and industry digital solutions. Through professional talent supply, we support the state-owned enterprise's leading role in the construction of "Digital China", helping clients consolidate their technological leadership in the wave of new infrastructure and achieve mutual empowerment between strategic layout and talent reserve.

ecommerce.name: E-commerce & Consumer Goods
ecommerce.title: Help a leading e-commerce enterprise achieve user scale and GMV growth targets
ecommerce.description: Ribo closely follows the trend of e-commerce omni-channel integration and has reached a talent cooperation with a leading enterprise, targeting recruitment for core positions such as omni-channel operations, user growth, livestreaming operations, cross-border compliance, and intelligent supply chain. Relying on business scenario deconstruction and massive talent reserves, we quickly build teams with both traffic thinking and practical experience for clients through precise matching systems and scenario-based interview mechanisms. The cooperation focuses on breaking through traffic bottlenecks, improving cross-border efficiency, and optimizing supply chain response, empowering clients with the dual wheels of "talent + scenario" to help them consolidate their leading position in livestreaming e-commerce, cross-border trade, and other tracks, achieving user scale and GMV growth targets.

newenergy.name: New Energy
newenergy.title: Help a large group implement an industry-leading new energy centralized control platform
newenergy.description: A large group focusing on strategic breakthroughs in the new energy industry plans to implement an industry-leading new energy centralized control platform. This system will achieve full-dimensional real-time monitoring, intelligent scheduling, and full life cycle management of the group's new energy assets across all plants and stations, deeply empowering the group's digital transformation, intelligent upgrading, and refined management capabilities in the new energy field. This deployment aims to help the group build an industry-leading new energy intelligent management system, accelerate green and low-carbon technology innovation and industrial upgrading, and provide core momentum support for the implementation of "dual carbon" goals.

semiconductor.name: Semiconductor
semiconductor.title: Hard Technology Human Capital Empowerment
semiconductor.description: As a human capital service provider focusing on hard technology fields, Ribo deeply anchors the technical barriers and industrial chain coordination needs of the semiconductor industry, and has reached a strategic talent cooperation with a core semiconductor enterprise. This cooperation focuses on helping clients accelerate the advanced process R&D process, improve wafer yield control level, and break through the bottleneck of key equipment localization, supporting enterprises in building core technical barriers in chip autonomy, supply chain security, and global semiconductor competition pattern with professional talent supply, promoting the efficient implementation of the "China Chip" industrial upgrading goal.

chiring.headline: Headhunting Service
chiring.description: Focusing on high-end talent recruitment, deeply rooted in technology and finance sectors, leveraging precise profiling and global talent pools to deliver core candidates within 7 days with an average success rate of 96%, helping enterprises build critical talent barriers.
chiring.seniorTeamDesc: The search team currently consists of 15 senior consultants with an average of 5.2 years of experience, including 8 members boasting over 10 years of executive search expertise for high-level positions. To date, the team has successfully delivered more than 10,000 high-level talents. Demonstrating operational excellence, the team's delivery efficiency significantly exceeds industry standards, achieving an average placement cycle time of 26 days in 2024 (compared to the industry average of 35 days). Their performance is further highlighted by a 93% annual repeat purchase rate from core clients and a candidate retention rate exceeding 96% after one year of employment.
chiring.smartTalentDesc: Through its self-developed intelligent talent mapping system, the team can access a high-quality talent database of over 2.6 million professionals in the APAC region. By combining deep industry insights (focusing on three key sectors: internet technology, fintech, and smart manufacturing), the client NPS satisfaction score has consistently maintained above 94 points over the past three years.

foreignInvestmentCase.title: Foreign Investment Management Company
foreignInvestmentCase.description: Commissioned by a foreign investment management company, we initiated an executive team building project covering the core positions of CEO, CFO, and CTO. First, through in-depth research on the company's strategic positioning and business layout, we clarified the experience and professional capabilities that CEO, CFO, and CTO candidates should possess. During the selection process, we adopted a multi-dimensional assessment model, combined with industry networks to precisely reach candidates, and through multiple rounds of structured interviews and background research, we ultimately built an executive team for the company that combines international vision with local practical experience. This core management team will, through efficient collaboration, help the company implement its strategy in a complex market environment, improve asset management efficiency, strengthen risk prevention and control capabilities, and lay a solid management foundation for the company's long-term stable development.

news1.title: Ribo Partners with Japanese MYK
news1.content: Ribo has officially signed a strategic agreement with MYK, a century-old Japanese materials company. Both parties will jointly build a zero-carbon laboratory in Huaibei, utilizing MYK's world-leading low-energy polymerization technology to reduce carbon emissions of Ribo's high-purity electronic-grade solvent products by over 40%. They will also launch recyclable packaging resins for global new energy vehicles and semiconductor customers, with the first orders already entering Nissan and Tesla's supply chains. This marks the first large-scale reverse export of Chinese green high-end chemical materials to Japan's core market.
news1.author: Sarah Johnson

news2.title: Ribo Partners with FIL Staffing Services
news2.content: Ribo Consulting has entered a strategic partnership with FIL staffing services. Leveraging 13 years of experience in human resources and software outsourcing, Ribo will provide FIL with a one-stop human resources solution covering recruitment, dispatch, compensation, and compliance risk control. This will help FIL quickly build flexible technical teams, reduce labor costs by over 30%, and simultaneously implement digital attendance and performance systems for dynamic visualization management of project personnel, jointly accelerating FIL's global business expansion.
news2.author: Michael Brown

news3.title: Ribo Data Technical Sharing with Alibaba Cloud
news3.content: Ribo Data recently held a technical sharing session on "Cloud-Native Real-Time Data Warehouse" with Alibaba Cloud. Both parties conducted in-depth exchanges around PolarDB-X distributed architecture, in-memory computing acceleration, and AI-enhanced analytics, demonstrating scenarios such as second-level scaling and TB-level ad-hoc queries. Ribo's RapidsDB has completed ecosystem integration with PolarDB, providing enterprises with a one-stop real-time data intelligence solution and jointly promoting cloud innovation.
news3.author: Linda Davis

news4.title: James Wilson
news4.content: We needed a solution that could grow with us. The scalability and customization options are impressive. Our portfolio finally reflects the quality of our work, thanks to this fantastic tool.
news4.author: James Wilson

news5.title: Emily Clark
news5.content: The mobile responsiveness is seamless, which is crucial in today's market. Our clients love how easy it is to browse our projects on any device. It's been a significant upgrade for our online presence.
news5.author: Emily Clark

case.title: A Foreign Asset Management Company
case.description: Commissioned by a foreign asset management company, we efficiently completed the targeted dispatch of 120 IT engineers across the Asia-Pacific region within a 3-month cycle, achieving a 99% training pass rate. At the initial phase of the project, our team engaged deeply with the client to clarify specific job requirements in areas such as cloud computing, software development, and system maintenance across regional branches in the Asia-Pacific. We simultaneously formulated a three-dimensional screening standard covering technical capability, language proficiency, and cross-cultural collaboration, and precisely identified over 200 candidates from the global talent pool to enter the reserved pipeline. During the 4-week pre-employment training phase, we designed a customized curriculum based on the regional technical architecture features, including core modules such as microservices architecture practice, multi-language development environment adaptation, and regional data compliance standards, while introducing a real-time online assessment system for staged capability calibration.
